generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a bicycle lane marking, which is part of the road.
- sidewalk: The sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and lined with parked cars.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, lining both sides.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the right side of the street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging over the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the street, including a blue sign with white text.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
